module Amazonka.RAM.Types.Principal

-- | Describes a principal for use with Resource Access Manager.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPrincipal</a> smart constructor.
data Principal
Principal' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Principal

-- | The time when the principal was associated with the resource share.
[$sel:creationTime:Principal'] :: Principal -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareArn:Principal'] :: Principal -> Maybe Text

-- | The time when the association was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedTime:Principal'] :: Principal -> Maybe POSIX

-- | Indicates whether the principal belongs to the same organization in
--   Organizations as the Amazon Web Services account that owns the
--   resource share.
[$sel:external:Principal'] :: Principal -> Maybe Bool

-- | The ID of the principal.
[$sel:id:Principal'] :: Principal -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Principal</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:Principal'</a>, <a>principal_creationTime</a> -
--   The time when the principal was associated with the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareArn:Principal'</a>,
--   <a>principal_resourceShareArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedTime:Principal'</a>,
--   <a>principal_lastUpdatedTime</a> - The time when the association was
--   last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:external:Principal'</a>, <a>principal_external</a> - Indicates
--   whether the principal belongs to the same organization in
--   Organizations as the Amazon Web Services account that owns the
--   resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Principal'</a>, <a>principal_id</a> - The ID of the
--   principal.
newPrincipal :: Principal

principal_creationTime :: Lens' Principal (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
principal_resourceShareArn :: Lens' Principal (Maybe Text)

--   Organizations as the Amazon Web Services account that owns the
--   resource share.

-- | The ID of the principal.

--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceShareAssociation</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceShareAssociation
ResourceShareAssociation' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe ResourceShareAssociationStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ResourceShareAssociationType -> Maybe Text -> ResourceShareAssociation

-- | The associated entity. For resource associations, this is the Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. For principal associations, this
--   is one of the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>An Amazon Web Services account ID</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an organization in Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an organizational unit (OU) in Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM role</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM user</li>
--   </ul>

module Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceShareInvitation

-- | Describes an invitation to join a resource share.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceShareInvitation</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceShareInvitation
ResourceShareInvitation' :: Maybe ResourceShareInvitationStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [ResourceShareAssociation] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> ResourceShareInvitation

-- | The status of the invitation.
[$sel:status:ResourceShareInvitation'] :: ResourceShareInvitation -> Maybe ResourceShareInvitationStatus

-- | The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that sent the invitation.
[$sel:senderAccountId:ResourceShareInvitation'] :: ResourceShareInvitation -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareArn:ResourceShareInvitation'] :: ResourceShareInvitation -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that received the
--   invitation.
[$sel:receiverAccountId:ResourceShareInvitation'] :: ResourceShareInvitation -> Maybe Text

-- | To view the resources associated with a pending resource share
--   invitation, use <a>ListPendingInvitationResources</a>.
[$sel:resourceShareAssociations:ResourceShareInvitation'] :: ResourceShareInvitation -> Maybe [ResourceShareAssociation]

-- | The name of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareName:ResourceShareInvitation'] :: ResourceShareInvitation -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM user or IAM role that
--   received the invitation.
[$sel:receiverArn:ResourceShareInvitation'] :: ResourceShareInvitation -> Maybe Text

-- | The date and time when the invitation was sent.
[$sel:invitationTimestamp:ResourceShareInvitation'] :: ResourceShareInvitation -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the invitation.
[$sel:resourceShareInvitationArn:ResourceShareInvitation'] :: ResourceShareInvitation -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ResourceShareInvitation</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

--   <a>resourceShareInvitation_senderAccountId</a> - The ID of the Amazon
--   Web Services account that sent the invitation.

--   <a>resourceShareInvitation_resourceShareArn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the resource share.
--

module Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceSharePermissionDetail

-- | Information about an RAM permission.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceSharePermissionDetail</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceSharePermissionDetail
ResourceSharePermissionDetail' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> ResourceSharePermissionDetail

-- | The date and time when the permission was created.
[$sel:creationTime:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'] :: ResourceSharePermissionDetail -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The resource type to which the permission applies.
[$sel:resourceType:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'] :: ResourceSharePermissionDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The date and time when the permission was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedTime:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'] :: ResourceSharePermissionDetail -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the permission.
[$sel:arn:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'] :: ResourceSharePermissionDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies whether the version of the permission is set to the default
--   version for this permission.
[$sel:defaultVersion:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'] :: ResourceSharePermissionDetail -> Maybe Bool

-- | The name of the permission.
[$sel:name:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'] :: ResourceSharePermissionDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the version of the permission.
[$sel:version:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'] :: ResourceSharePermissionDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies whether the version of the permission is set to the default
--   version for this resource type.
[$sel:isResourceTypeDefault:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'] :: ResourceSharePermissionDetail -> Maybe Bool

-- | The permission's effect and actions in JSON format. The
--   <tt>effect</tt> indicates whether the actions are allowed or denied.
--   The <tt>actions</tt> list the API actions to which the principal is
--   granted or denied access.
[$sel:permission:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'] :: ResourceSharePermissionDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ResourceSharePermissionDetail</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionDetail_creationTime</a> - The date and time
--   when the permission was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceType:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionDetail_resourceType</a> - The resource type
--   to which the permission applies.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedTime:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionDetail_lastUpdatedTime</a> - The date and
--   time when the permission was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionDetail_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of the permission.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultVersion:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionDetail_defaultVersion</a> - Specifies
--   whether the version of the permission is set to the default version
--   for this permission.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionDetail_name</a> - The name of the
--   permission.
--   
--   <a>$sel:version:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionDetail_version</a> - The identifier for the
--   version of the permission.
--   
--   <a>$sel:isResourceTypeDefault:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionDetail_isResourceTypeDefault</a> - Specifies
--   whether the version of the permission is set to the default version
--   for this resource type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:permission:ResourceSharePermissionDetail'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionDetail_permission</a> - The permission's
--   effect and actions in JSON format. The <tt>effect</tt> indicates
--   whether the actions are allowed or denied. The <tt>actions</tt> list
--   the API actions to which the principal is granted or denied access.
newResourceSharePermissionDetail :: ResourceSharePermissionDetail

-- | The date and time when the permission was created.
resourceSharePermissionDetail_creationTime :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionDetail (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The resource type to which the permission applies.
resourceSharePermissionDetail_resourceType :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | The date and time when the permission was last updated.
resourceSharePermissionDetail_lastUpdatedTime :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionDetail (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the permission.
resourceSharePermissionDetail_arn :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies whether the version of the permission is set to the default
--   version for this permission.
resourceSharePermissionDetail_defaultVersion :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionDetail (Maybe Bool)

-- | The name of the permission.
resourceSharePermissionDetail_name :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the version of the permission.
resourceSharePermissionDetail_version :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies whether the version of the permission is set to the default
--   version for this resource type.
resourceSharePermissionDetail_isResourceTypeDefault :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionDetail (Maybe Bool)

-- | The permission's effect and actions in JSON format. The
--   <tt>effect</tt> indicates whether the actions are allowed or denied.
--   The <tt>actions</tt> list the API actions to which the principal is
--   granted or denied access.
resourceSharePermissionDetail_permission :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionDetail (Maybe Text)

instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceSharePermissionDetail.ResourceSharePermissionDetail

module Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceSharePermissionSummary

-- | Information about a permission that is associated with a resource
--   share.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceSharePermissionSummary</a> smart
--   constructor.
data ResourceSharePermissionSummary
ResourceSharePermissionSummary' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> ResourceSharePermissionSummary

-- | The date and time when the permission was created.
[$sel:creationTime:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'] :: ResourceSharePermissionSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The current status of the permission.
[$sel:status:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'] :: ResourceSharePermissionSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The type of resource to which the permission applies.
[$sel:resourceType:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'] :: ResourceSharePermissionSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The date and time when the permission was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedTime:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'] :: ResourceSharePermissionSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the permission.
[$sel:arn:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'] :: ResourceSharePermissionSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies whether the version of the permission is set to the default
--   version for this permission.
[$sel:defaultVersion:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'] :: ResourceSharePermissionSummary -> Maybe Bool

-- | The name of the permission.
[$sel:name:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'] :: ResourceSharePermissionSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The identifier for the version of the permission.
[$sel:version:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'] :: ResourceSharePermissionSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | Specifies whether the version of the permission is set to the default
--   version for this resource type.
[$sel:isResourceTypeDefault:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'] :: ResourceSharePermissionSummary -> Maybe Bool

-- | Create a value of <a>ResourceSharePermissionSummary</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionSummary_creationTime</a> - The date and time
--   when the permission was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionSummary_status</a> - The current status of
--   the permission.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceType:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionSummary_resourceType</a> - The type of
--   resource to which the permission applies.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedTime:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionSummary_lastUpdatedTime</a> - The date and
--   time when the permission was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionSummary_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of the permission.
--   
--   <a>$sel:defaultVersion:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionSummary_defaultVersion</a> - Specifies
--   whether the version of the permission is set to the default version
--   for this permission.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionSummary_name</a> - The name of the
--   permission.
--   
--   <a>$sel:version:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionSummary_version</a> - The identifier for the
--   version of the permission.
--   
--   <a>$sel:isResourceTypeDefault:ResourceSharePermissionSummary'</a>,
--   <a>resourceSharePermissionSummary_isResourceTypeDefault</a> -
--   Specifies whether the version of the permission is set to the default
--   version for this resource type.
newResourceSharePermissionSummary :: ResourceSharePermissionSummary

-- | The current status of the permission.

-- | The type of resource to which the permission applies.
resourceSharePermissionSummary_resourceType :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The date and time when the permission was last updated.
resourceSharePermissionSummary_lastUpdatedTime :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionSummary (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the permission.
resourceSharePermissionSummary_arn :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies whether the version of the permission is set to the default
--   version for this permission.
resourceSharePermissionSummary_defaultVersion :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionSummary (Maybe Bool)

-- | The name of the permission.
resourceSharePermissionSummary_name :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the version of the permission.
resourceSharePermissionSummary_version :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies whether the version of the permission is set to the default
--   version for this resource type.
resourceSharePermissionSummary_isResourceTypeDefault :: Lens' ResourceSharePermissionSummary (Maybe Bool)

module Amazonka.RAM.Types.Resource

-- | Describes a resource associated with a resource share.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResource</a> smart constructor.
data Resource
Resource' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe ResourceStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Resource

-- | The time when the resource was associated with the resource share.
[$sel:creationTime:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The status of the resource.
[$sel:status:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe ResourceStatus

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareArn:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | The time when the association was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedTime:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
[$sel:arn:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource group. This value is
--   returned only if the resource is a resource group.
[$sel:resourceGroupArn:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | A message about the status of the resource.
[$sel:statusMessage:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | The resource type.
[$sel:type':Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Resource</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_creationTime</a> - The
--   time when the resource was associated with the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_status</a> - The status of
--   the resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareArn:Resource'</a>,
--   <a>resource_resourceShareArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedTime:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_lastUpdatedTime</a>
--   - The time when the association was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceGroupArn:Resource'</a>,
--   <a>resource_resourceGroupArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the resource group. This value is returned only if the resource is a
--   resource group.
--   
--   <a>$sel:statusMessage:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_statusMessage</a> - A
--   message about the status of the resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':Resource'</a>, <a>resource_type</a> - The resource type.
newResource :: Resource

-- | The time when the resource was associated with the resource share.
resource_creationTime :: Lens' Resource (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The status of the resource.
resource_status :: Lens' Resource (Maybe ResourceStatus)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
resource_resourceShareArn :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The time when the association was last updated.
resource_lastUpdatedTime :: Lens' Resource (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
resource_arn :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource group. This value is
--   returned only if the resource is a resource group.
resource_resourceGroupArn :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | A message about the status of the resource.
resource_statusMessage :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The resource type.
resource_type :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.RAM.Types.Resource.Resource
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.RAM.Types.Resource.Resource
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.RAM.Types.Resource.Resource
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.RAM.Types.Resource.Resource
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.RAM.Types.Resource.Resource
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.RAM.Types.Resource.Resource
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.RAM.Types.Resource.Resource


module Amazonka.RAM.Types.ServiceNameAndResourceType

-- | Information about the shareable resource types and the Amazon Web
--   Services services to which they belong.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newServiceNameAndResourceType</a> smart constructor.
data ServiceNameAndResourceType
ServiceNameAndResourceType' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> ServiceNameAndResourceType

-- | The shareable resource types.
[$sel:resourceType:ServiceNameAndResourceType'] :: ServiceNameAndResourceType -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the Amazon Web Services services to which the resources
--   belong.
[$sel:serviceName:ServiceNameAndResourceType'] :: ServiceNameAndResourceType -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ServiceNameAndResourceType</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceType:ServiceNameAndResourceType'</a>,
--   <a>serviceNameAndResourceType_resourceType</a> - The shareable
--   resource types.
--   
--   <a>$sel:serviceName:ServiceNameAndResourceType'</a>,
--   <a>serviceNameAndResourceType_serviceName</a> - The name of the Amazon
--   Web Services services to which the resources belong.
newServiceNameAndResourceType :: ServiceNameAndResourceType

-- | The shareable resource types.
serviceNameAndResourceType_resourceType :: Lens' ServiceNameAndResourceType (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the Amazon Web Services services to which the resources
--   belong.
serviceNameAndResourceType_serviceName :: Lens' ServiceNameAndResourceType (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.RAM.Types.ServiceNameAndResourceType.ServiceNameAndResourceType
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.RAM.Types.ServiceNameAndResourceType.ServiceNameAndResourceType
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.RAM.Types.ServiceNameAndResourceType.ServiceNameAndResourceType
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.RAM.Types.ServiceNameAndResourceType.ServiceNameAndResourceType
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.RAM.Types.ServiceNameAndResourceType.ServiceNameAndResourceType

instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.RAM.Types.ServiceNameAndResourceType.ServiceNameAndResourceType


module Amazonka.RAM.Types.Tag

-- | Information about a tag.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newTag</a> smart constructor.
data Tag
Tag' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Tag

-- | The value of the tag.
[$sel:value:Tag'] :: Tag -> Maybe Text

-- | The key of the tag.
[$sel:key:Tag'] :: Tag -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Tag</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:Tag'</a>, <a>tag_value</a> - The value of the tag.
--   
--   <a>$sel:key:Tag'</a>, <a>tag_key</a> - The key of the tag.
newTag :: Tag

tag_value :: Lens' Tag (Maybe Text)

-- | The key of the tag.
tag_key :: Lens' Tag (Maybe Text)

module Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceShare

-- | Describes a resource share.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceShare</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceShare
ResourceShare' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe ResourceShareStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ResourceShareFeatureSet -> Maybe [Tag] -> ResourceShare

-- | The time when the resource share was created.
[$sel:creationTime:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The status of the resource share.
[$sel:status:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe ResourceShareStatus

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareArn:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource
--   share.
[$sel:owningAccountId:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe Text

-- | The time when the resource share was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedTime:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe POSIX

-- | Indicates whether principals outside your organization in
--   Organizations can be associated with a resource share.
[$sel:allowExternalPrincipals:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe Bool

-- | The name of the resource share.
[$sel:name:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe Text

-- | A message about the status of the resource share.
[$sel:statusMessage:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe Text

-- | Indicates how the resource share was created. Possible values include:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>CREATED_FROM_POLICY</tt> - Indicates that the resource share
--   was created from an Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management
--   (Amazon Web Services IAM) policy attached to a resource. These
--   resource shares are visible only to the Amazon Web Services account
--   that created it. They cannot be modified in RAM.</li>
--   <li><tt>PROMOTING_TO_STANDARD</tt> - The resource share is in the
--   process of being promoted. For more information, see
--   PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy.</li>
--   <li><tt>STANDARD</tt> - Indicates that the resource share was created
--   in RAM using the console or APIs. These resource shares are visible to
--   all principals. They can be modified in RAM.</li>
--   </ul>
[$sel:featureSet:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe ResourceShareFeatureSet

-- | The tags for the resource share.
[$sel:tags:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe [Tag]

-- | Create a value of <a>ResourceShare</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_creationTime</a> - The time when the resource share
--   was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ResourceShare'</a>, <a>resourceShare_status</a> - The
--   status of the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareArn:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_resourceShareArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
--   of the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:owningAccountId:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_owningAccountId</a> - The ID of the Amazon Web
--   Services account that owns the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedTime:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_lastUpdatedTime</a> - The time when the resource
--   share was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:allowExternalPrincipals:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_allowExternalPrincipals</a> - Indicates whether
--   principals outside your organization in Organizations can be
--   associated with a resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ResourceShare'</a>, <a>resourceShare_name</a> - The name
--   of the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:statusMessage:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_statusMessage</a> - A message about the status of the
--   resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:featureSet:ResourceShare'</a>, <a>resourceShare_featureSet</a>
--   - Indicates how the resource share was created. Possible values
--   include:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>CREATED_FROM_POLICY</tt> - Indicates that the resource share
--   was created from an Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management
--   (Amazon Web Services IAM) policy attached to a resource. These
--   resource shares are visible only to the Amazon Web Services account
--   that created it. They cannot be modified in RAM.</li>
--   <li><tt>PROMOTING_TO_STANDARD</tt> - The resource share is in the
--   process of being promoted. For more information, see
--   PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy.</li>
--   <li><tt>STANDARD</tt> - Indicates that the resource share was created
--   in RAM using the console or APIs. These resource shares are visible to
--   all principals. They can be modified in RAM.</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ResourceShare'</a>, <a>resourceShare_tags</a> - The tags
--   for the resource share.
newResourceShare :: ResourceShare

-- | The time when the resource share was created.
resourceShare_creationTime :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The status of the resource share.
resourceShare_status :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe ResourceShareStatus)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
resourceShare_resourceShareArn :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource
--   share.
resourceShare_owningAccountId :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe Text)

-- | The time when the resource share was last updated.
resourceShare_lastUpdatedTime :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | Indicates whether principals outside your organization in
--   Organizations can be associated with a resource share.
resourceShare_allowExternalPrincipals :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe Bool)

-- | The name of the resource share.
resourceShare_name :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe Text)

-- | A message about the status of the resource share.
resourceShare_statusMessage :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe Text)

-- | Indicates how the resource share was created. Possible values include:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>CREATED_FROM_POLICY</tt> - Indicates that the resource share
--   was created from an Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management
--   (Amazon Web Services IAM) policy attached to a resource. These
--   resource shares are visible only to the Amazon Web Services account
--   that created it. They cannot be modified in RAM.</li>
--   <li><tt>PROMOTING_TO_STANDARD</tt> - The resource share is in the
--   process of being promoted. For more information, see
--   PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy.</li>
--   <li><tt>STANDARD</tt> - Indicates that the resource share was created
--   in RAM using the console or APIs. These resource shares are visible to
--   all principals. They can be modified in RAM.</li>
--   </ul>
resourceShare_featureSet :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe ResourceShareFeatureSet)

-- | The tags for the resource share.
resourceShare_tags :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe [Tag])
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceShare.ResourceShare
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceShare.ResourceShare
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceShare.ResourceShare
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceShare.ResourceShare
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceShare.ResourceShare
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceShare.ResourceShare
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.RAM.Types.ResourceShare.ResourceShare


module Amazonka.RAM.Types.TagFilter

-- | Used to filter information based on tags.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newTagFilter</a> smart constructor.
data TagFilter
TagFilter' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> TagFilter

-- | The tag values.
[$sel:tagValues:TagFilter'] :: TagFilter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The tag key.
[$sel:tagKey:TagFilter'] :: TagFilter -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>TagFilter</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:tagValues:TagFilter'</a>, <a>tagFilter_tagValues</a> - The tag
--   values.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tagKey:TagFilter'</a>, <a>tagFilter_tagKey</a> - The tag key.
newTagFilter :: TagFilter

-- | The tag values.
tagFilter_tagValues :: Lens' TagFilter (Maybe [Text])

-- | The tag key.
tagFilter_tagKey :: Lens' TagFilter (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Amazonka.RAM.Types.TagFilter.TagFilter
instance GHC.Show.Show Amazonka.RAM.Types.TagFilter.TagFilter
instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.RAM.Types.TagFilter.TagFilter
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Amazonka.RAM.Types.TagFilter.TagFilter
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Amazonka.RAM.Types.TagFilter.TagFilter
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Amazonka.RAM.Types.TagFilter.TagFilter
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.RAM.Types.TagFilter.TagFilter


module Amazonka.RAM.Types

-- | API version <tt>2018-01-04</tt> of the Amazon Resource Access Manager
--   SDK configuration.
defaultService :: Service

-- | A client token is not valid.
_InvalidClientTokenException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The specified tag is a reserved word and cannot be used.
_TagPolicyViolationException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | A parameter is not valid.
_InvalidParameterException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The specified resource type is not valid.
_InvalidResourceTypeException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for an invitation was not found.
_ResourceShareInvitationArnNotFoundException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The specified value for NextToken is not valid.
_InvalidNextTokenException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The format of an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) is not valid.
_MalformedArnException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The service could not respond to the request due to an internal
--   problem.
_ServerInternalException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | A specified resource was not found.
_UnknownResourceException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The requested operation is not permitted.
_OperationNotPermittedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The specified value for MaxResults is not valid.
_InvalidMaxResultsException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The service is not available.
_ServiceUnavailableException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) was not found.
_ResourceArnNotFoundException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | A client token input parameter was reused with an operation, but at
--   least one of the other input parameters is different from the previous
--   call to the operation.
_IdempotentParameterMismatchException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | A required input parameter is missing.
_MissingRequiredParameterException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The requested tags exceed the limit for your account.
_TagLimitExceededException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The requested state transition is not valid.
_InvalidStateTransitionException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The invitation was already accepted.
_ResourceShareInvitationAlreadyAcceptedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The requested resource share exceeds the limit for your account.
_ResourceShareLimitExceededException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The invitation is expired.
_ResourceShareInvitationExpiredException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The invitation was already rejected.
_ResourceShareInvitationAlreadyRejectedException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError
newtype ResourceOwner
ResourceOwner' :: Text -> ResourceOwner
[fromResourceOwner] :: ResourceOwner -> Text
pattern ResourceOwner_OTHER_ACCOUNTS :: ResourceOwner
pattern ResourceOwner_SELF :: ResourceOwner
newtype ResourceShareAssociationStatus
ResourceShareAssociationStatus' :: Text -> ResourceShareAssociationStatus
[fromResourceShareAssociationStatus] :: ResourceShareAssociationStatus -> Text
pattern ResourceShareAssociationStatus_ASSOCIATED :: ResourceShareAssociationStatus
pattern ResourceShareAssociationStatus_ASSOCIATING :: ResourceShareAssociationStatus
pattern ResourceShareAssociationStatus_DISASSOCIATED :: ResourceShareAssociationStatus
pattern ResourceShareAssociationStatus_DISASSOCIATING :: ResourceShareAssociationStatus
pattern ResourceShareAssociationStatus_FAILED :: ResourceShareAssociationStatus
newtype ResourceShareAssociationType
ResourceShareAssociationType' :: Text -> ResourceShareAssociationType
[fromResourceShareAssociationType] :: ResourceShareAssociationType -> Text
pattern ResourceShareAssociationType_PRINCIPAL :: ResourceShareAssociationType
pattern ResourceShareAssociationType_RESOURCE :: ResourceShareAssociationType
newtype ResourceShareFeatureSet
ResourceShareFeatureSet' :: Text -> ResourceShareFeatureSet
[fromResourceShareFeatureSet] :: ResourceShareFeatureSet -> Text
pattern ResourceShareFeatureSet_CREATED_FROM_POLICY :: ResourceShareFeatureSet
pattern ResourceShareFeatureSet_PROMOTING_TO_STANDARD :: ResourceShareFeatureSet
pattern ResourceShareFeatureSet_STANDARD :: ResourceShareFeatureSet
newtype ResourceShareInvitationStatus
ResourceShareInvitationStatus' :: Text -> ResourceShareInvitationStatus
[fromResourceShareInvitationStatus] :: ResourceShareInvitationStatus -> Text
pattern ResourceShareInvitationStatus_ACCEPTED :: ResourceShareInvitationStatus
pattern ResourceShareInvitationStatus_EXPIRED :: ResourceShareInvitationStatus
pattern ResourceShareInvitationStatus_PENDING :: ResourceShareInvitationStatus
pattern ResourceShareInvitationStatus_REJECTED :: ResourceShareInvitationStatus
newtype ResourceShareStatus
ResourceShareStatus' :: Text -> ResourceShareStatus
[fromResourceShareStatus] :: ResourceShareStatus -> Text
pattern ResourceShareStatus_ACTIVE :: ResourceShareStatus
pattern ResourceShareStatus_DELETED :: ResourceShareStatus
pattern ResourceShareStatus_DELETING :: ResourceShareStatus
pattern ResourceShareStatus_FAILED :: ResourceShareStatus
pattern ResourceShareStatus_PENDING :: ResourceShareStatus
newtype ResourceStatus
ResourceStatus' :: Text -> ResourceStatus
[fromResourceStatus] :: ResourceStatus -> Text
pattern ResourceStatus_AVAILABLE :: ResourceStatus
pattern ResourceStatus_LIMIT_EXCEEDED :: ResourceStatus
pattern ResourceStatus_PENDING :: ResourceStatus
pattern ResourceStatus_UNAVAILABLE :: ResourceStatus
pattern ResourceStatus_ZONAL_RESOURCE_INACCESSIBLE :: ResourceStatus

-- | Describes a principal for use with Resource Access Manager.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPrincipal</a> smart constructor.
data Principal
Principal' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Principal

-- | The time when the principal was associated with the resource share.
[$sel:creationTime:Principal'] :: Principal -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareArn:Principal'] :: Principal -> Maybe Text

-- | The time when the association was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedTime:Principal'] :: Principal -> Maybe POSIX

-- | Indicates whether the principal belongs to the same organization in
--   Organizations as the Amazon Web Services account that owns the
--   resource share.
[$sel:external:Principal'] :: Principal -> Maybe Bool

-- | The ID of the principal.
[$sel:id:Principal'] :: Principal -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Principal</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:Principal'</a>, <a>principal_creationTime</a> -
--   The time when the principal was associated with the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareArn:Principal'</a>,
--   <a>principal_resourceShareArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedTime:Principal'</a>,
--   <a>principal_lastUpdatedTime</a> - The time when the association was
--   last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:external:Principal'</a>, <a>principal_external</a> - Indicates
--   whether the principal belongs to the same organization in
--   Organizations as the Amazon Web Services account that owns the
--   resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Principal'</a>, <a>principal_id</a> - The ID of the
--   principal.
newPrincipal :: Principal

-- | The time when the principal was associated with the resource share.
principal_creationTime :: Lens' Principal (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
principal_resourceShareArn :: Lens' Principal (Maybe Text)

-- | The time when the association was last updated.
principal_lastUpdatedTime :: Lens' Principal (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | Indicates whether the principal belongs to the same organization in
--   Organizations as the Amazon Web Services account that owns the
--   resource share.
principal_external :: Lens' Principal (Maybe Bool)

-- | The ID of the principal.
principal_id :: Lens' Principal (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes a resource associated with a resource share.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResource</a> smart constructor.
data Resource
Resource' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe ResourceStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Resource

-- | The time when the resource was associated with the resource share.
[$sel:creationTime:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The status of the resource.
[$sel:status:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe ResourceStatus

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareArn:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | The time when the association was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedTime:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
[$sel:arn:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource group. This value is
--   returned only if the resource is a resource group.
[$sel:resourceGroupArn:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | A message about the status of the resource.
[$sel:statusMessage:Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | The resource type.
[$sel:type':Resource'] :: Resource -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Resource</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_creationTime</a> - The
--   time when the resource was associated with the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_status</a> - The status of
--   the resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareArn:Resource'</a>,
--   <a>resource_resourceShareArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedTime:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_lastUpdatedTime</a>
--   - The time when the association was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_arn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceGroupArn:Resource'</a>,
--   <a>resource_resourceGroupArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the resource group. This value is returned only if the resource is a
--   resource group.
--   
--   <a>$sel:statusMessage:Resource'</a>, <a>resource_statusMessage</a> - A
--   message about the status of the resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:type':Resource'</a>, <a>resource_type</a> - The resource type.
newResource :: Resource

-- | The time when the resource was associated with the resource share.
resource_creationTime :: Lens' Resource (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The status of the resource.
resource_status :: Lens' Resource (Maybe ResourceStatus)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
resource_resourceShareArn :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The time when the association was last updated.
resource_lastUpdatedTime :: Lens' Resource (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
resource_arn :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource group. This value is
--   returned only if the resource is a resource group.
resource_resourceGroupArn :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | A message about the status of the resource.
resource_statusMessage :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | The resource type.
resource_type :: Lens' Resource (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes a resource share.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceShare</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceShare
ResourceShare' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe ResourceShareStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ResourceShareFeatureSet -> Maybe [Tag] -> ResourceShare

-- | The time when the resource share was created.
[$sel:creationTime:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The status of the resource share.
[$sel:status:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe ResourceShareStatus

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareArn:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource
--   share.
[$sel:owningAccountId:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe Text

-- | The time when the resource share was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedTime:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe POSIX

-- | Indicates whether principals outside your organization in
--   Organizations can be associated with a resource share.
[$sel:allowExternalPrincipals:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe Bool

-- | The name of the resource share.
[$sel:name:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe Text

-- | A message about the status of the resource share.
[$sel:statusMessage:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe Text

-- | Indicates how the resource share was created. Possible values include:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>CREATED_FROM_POLICY</tt> - Indicates that the resource share
--   was created from an Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management
--   (Amazon Web Services IAM) policy attached to a resource. These
--   resource shares are visible only to the Amazon Web Services account
--   that created it. They cannot be modified in RAM.</li>
--   <li><tt>PROMOTING_TO_STANDARD</tt> - The resource share is in the
--   process of being promoted. For more information, see
--   PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy.</li>
--   <li><tt>STANDARD</tt> - Indicates that the resource share was created
--   in RAM using the console or APIs. These resource shares are visible to
--   all principals. They can be modified in RAM.</li>
--   </ul>
[$sel:featureSet:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe ResourceShareFeatureSet

-- | The tags for the resource share.
[$sel:tags:ResourceShare'] :: ResourceShare -> Maybe [Tag]

-- | Create a value of <a>ResourceShare</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_creationTime</a> - The time when the resource share
--   was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ResourceShare'</a>, <a>resourceShare_status</a> - The
--   status of the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareArn:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_resourceShareArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
--   of the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:owningAccountId:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_owningAccountId</a> - The ID of the Amazon Web
--   Services account that owns the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedTime:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_lastUpdatedTime</a> - The time when the resource
--   share was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:allowExternalPrincipals:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_allowExternalPrincipals</a> - Indicates whether
--   principals outside your organization in Organizations can be
--   associated with a resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:ResourceShare'</a>, <a>resourceShare_name</a> - The name
--   of the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:statusMessage:ResourceShare'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShare_statusMessage</a> - A message about the status of the
--   resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:featureSet:ResourceShare'</a>, <a>resourceShare_featureSet</a>
--   - Indicates how the resource share was created. Possible values
--   include:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>CREATED_FROM_POLICY</tt> - Indicates that the resource share
--   was created from an Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management
--   (Amazon Web Services IAM) policy attached to a resource. These
--   resource shares are visible only to the Amazon Web Services account
--   that created it. They cannot be modified in RAM.</li>
--   <li><tt>PROMOTING_TO_STANDARD</tt> - The resource share is in the
--   process of being promoted. For more information, see
--   PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy.</li>
--   <li><tt>STANDARD</tt> - Indicates that the resource share was created
--   in RAM using the console or APIs. These resource shares are visible to
--   all principals. They can be modified in RAM.</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ResourceShare'</a>, <a>resourceShare_tags</a> - The tags
--   for the resource share.
newResourceShare :: ResourceShare

-- | The time when the resource share was created.
resourceShare_creationTime :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The status of the resource share.
resourceShare_status :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe ResourceShareStatus)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
resourceShare_resourceShareArn :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource
--   share.
resourceShare_owningAccountId :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe Text)

-- | The time when the resource share was last updated.
resourceShare_lastUpdatedTime :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | Indicates whether principals outside your organization in
--   Organizations can be associated with a resource share.
resourceShare_allowExternalPrincipals :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe Bool)

-- | The name of the resource share.
resourceShare_name :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe Text)

-- | A message about the status of the resource share.
resourceShare_statusMessage :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe Text)

-- | Indicates how the resource share was created. Possible values include:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>CREATED_FROM_POLICY</tt> - Indicates that the resource share
--   was created from an Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management
--   (Amazon Web Services IAM) policy attached to a resource. These
--   resource shares are visible only to the Amazon Web Services account
--   that created it. They cannot be modified in RAM.</li>
--   <li><tt>PROMOTING_TO_STANDARD</tt> - The resource share is in the
--   process of being promoted. For more information, see
--   PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy.</li>
--   <li><tt>STANDARD</tt> - Indicates that the resource share was created
--   in RAM using the console or APIs. These resource shares are visible to
--   all principals. They can be modified in RAM.</li>
--   </ul>
resourceShare_featureSet :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe ResourceShareFeatureSet)

-- | The tags for the resource share.
resourceShare_tags :: Lens' ResourceShare (Maybe [Tag])

-- | Describes an association with a resource share.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceShareAssociation</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceShareAssociation
ResourceShareAssociation' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe ResourceShareAssociationStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ResourceShareAssociationType -> Maybe Text -> ResourceShareAssociation

-- | The time when the association was created.
[$sel:creationTime:ResourceShareAssociation'] :: ResourceShareAssociation -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The status of the association.
[$sel:status:ResourceShareAssociation'] :: ResourceShareAssociation -> Maybe ResourceShareAssociationStatus

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareArn:ResourceShareAssociation'] :: ResourceShareAssociation -> Maybe Text

-- | The time when the association was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdatedTime:ResourceShareAssociation'] :: ResourceShareAssociation -> Maybe POSIX

-- | Indicates whether the principal belongs to the same organization in
--   Organizations as the Amazon Web Services account that owns the
--   resource share.
[$sel:external:ResourceShareAssociation'] :: ResourceShareAssociation -> Maybe Bool

-- | The name of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareName:ResourceShareAssociation'] :: ResourceShareAssociation -> Maybe Text

-- | The associated entity. For resource associations, this is the Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. For principal associations, this
--   is one of the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>An Amazon Web Services account ID</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an organization in Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an organizational unit (OU) in Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM role</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM user</li>
--   </ul>
[$sel:associatedEntity:ResourceShareAssociation'] :: ResourceShareAssociation -> Maybe Text

-- | The association type.
[$sel:associationType:ResourceShareAssociation'] :: ResourceShareAssociation -> Maybe ResourceShareAssociationType

-- | A message about the status of the association.
[$sel:statusMessage:ResourceShareAssociation'] :: ResourceShareAssociation -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ResourceShareAssociation</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:ResourceShareAssociation'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShareAssociation_creationTime</a> - The time when the
--   association was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ResourceShareAssociation'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShareAssociation_status</a> - The status of the
--   association.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareArn:ResourceShareAssociation'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShareAssociation_resourceShareArn</a> - The Amazon Resource
--   Name (ARN) of the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdatedTime:ResourceShareAssociation'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShareAssociation_lastUpdatedTime</a> - The time when the
--   association was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:external:ResourceShareAssociation'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShareAssociation_external</a> - Indicates whether the
--   principal belongs to the same organization in Organizations as the
--   Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareName:ResourceShareAssociation'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShareAssociation_resourceShareName</a> - The name of the
--   resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:associatedEntity:ResourceShareAssociation'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShareAssociation_associatedEntity</a> - The associated
--   entity. For resource associations, this is the Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of the resource. For principal associations, this is one of the
--   following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>An Amazon Web Services account ID</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an organization in Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an organizational unit (OU) in Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM role</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM user</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   <a>$sel:associationType:ResourceShareAssociation'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShareAssociation_associationType</a> - The association
--   type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:statusMessage:ResourceShareAssociation'</a>,
--   <a>resourceShareAssociation_statusMessage</a> - A message about the
--   status of the association.
newResourceShareAssociation :: ResourceShareAssociation

-- | The time when the association was created.
resourceShareAssociation_creationTime :: Lens' ResourceShareAssociation (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The status of the association.
resourceShareAssociation_status :: Lens' ResourceShareAssociation (Maybe ResourceShareAssociationStatus)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
resourceShareAssociation_resourceShareArn :: Lens' ResourceShareAssociation (Maybe Text)

-- | The time when the association was last updated.
resourceShareAssociation_lastUpdatedTime :: Lens' ResourceShareAssociation (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | Indicates whether the principal belongs to the same organization in
--   Organizations as the Amazon Web Services account that owns the
--   resource share.
resourceShareAssociation_external :: Lens' ResourceShareAssociation (Maybe Bool)

-- | The name of the resource share.
resourceShareAssociation_resourceShareName :: Lens' ResourceShareAssociation (Maybe Text)

-- | The associated entity. For resource associations, this is the Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. For principal associations, this
--   is one of the following:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>An Amazon Web Services account ID</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an organization in Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an organizational unit (OU) in Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM role</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM user</li>
--   </ul>
resourceShareAssociation_associatedEntity :: Lens' ResourceShareAssociation (Maybe Text)

-- | The association type.
resourceShareAssociation_associationType :: Lens' ResourceShareAssociation (Maybe ResourceShareAssociationType)

-- | A message about the status of the association.
resourceShareAssociation_statusMessage :: Lens' ResourceShareAssociation (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes an invitation to join a resource share.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newResourceShareInvitation</a> smart constructor.
data ResourceShareInvitation
ResourceShareInvitation' :: Maybe ResourceShareInvitationStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [ResourceShareAssociation] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> ResourceShareInvitation

-- | The status of the invitation.

-- | The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that sent the invitation.

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.

--   invitation.

--   invitation, use <a>ListPendingInvitationResources</a>.

--   tags.

-- | Rejects an invitation to a resource share from another Amazon Web
--   Services account.
module Amazonka.RAM.RejectResourceShareInvitation

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newRejectResourceShareInvitation</a> smart constructor.
data RejectResourceShareInvitation
RejectResourceShareInvitation' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> RejectResourceShareInvitation

-- | A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the
--   idempotency of the request.
[$sel:clientToken:RejectResourceShareInvitation'] :: RejectResourceShareInvitation -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the invitation.
[$sel:resourceShareInvitationArn:RejectResourceShareInvitation'] :: RejectResourceShareInvitation -> Text

--   optional fields omitted.

--   case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency
--   of the request.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareInvitationArn:RejectResourceShareInvitation'</a>,
--   <a>rejectResourceShareInvitation_resourceShareInvitationArn</a> - The
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the invitation.

--   idempotency of the request.

rejectResourceShareInvitation_resourceShareInvitationArn :: Lens' RejectResourceShareInvitation Text

instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Amazonka.RAM.RejectResourceShareInvitation.RejectResourceShareInvitation
instance Amazonka.Data.Path.ToPath Amazonka.RAM.RejectResourceShareInvitation.RejectResourceShareInvitation
instance Amazonka.Data.Query.ToQuery Amazonka.RAM.RejectResourceShareInvitation.RejectResourceShareInvitation


-- | Resource shares that were created by attaching a policy to a resource
--   are visible only to the resource share owner, and the resource share
--   cannot be modified in RAM.
--   
--   Use this API action to promote the resource share. When you promote
--   the resource share, it becomes:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>Visible to all principals that it is shared with.</li>
--   <li>Modifiable in RAM.</li>
--   </ul>
module Amazonka.RAM.PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newPromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy</a> smart
--   constructor.
data PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy
PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy' :: Text -> PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share to promote.
[$sel:resourceShareArn:PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy'] :: PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy</a> with
--   all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareArn:PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy'</a>,
--   <a>promoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy_resourceShareArn</a> - The
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share to promote.
newPromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy :: Text -> PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share to promote.
promoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy_resourceShareArn :: Lens' PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy Text

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newPromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse</a>
--   smart constructor.
data PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse
PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse' :: Maybe Bool -> Int -> PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse

-- | Indicates whether the request succeeded.
[$sel:returnValue:PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse'] :: PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse -> Maybe Bool

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse'] :: PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse</a>
--   with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:returnValue:PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse'</a>,
--   <a>promoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse_returnValue</a> -
--   Indicates whether the request succeeded.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse'</a>,
--   <a>promoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse_httpStatus</a> - The
--   response's http status code.

promoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicyResponse Int

instance GHC.Read.Read Amazonka.RAM.PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy.PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy

instance Amazonka.Data.Query.ToQuery Amazonka.RAM.PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy.PromoteResourceShareCreatedFromPolicy


-- | Lists the resources that you added to a resource shares or the
--   resources that are shared with you.
--   
--   This operation returns paginated results.
module Amazonka.RAM.ListResources

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newListResources</a> smart constructor.
data ListResources
ListResources' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe [Text] -> ResourceOwner -> ListResources

-- | The resource type.
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>acm-pca:CertificateAuthority</tt> |
--   <tt>appmesh:Mesh</tt> | <tt>codebuild:Project</tt> |
--   <tt>codebuild:ReportGroup</tt> | <tt>ec2:CapacityReservation</tt> |
--   <tt>ec2:DedicatedHost</tt> | <tt>ec2:LocalGatewayRouteTable</tt> |
--   <tt>ec2:PrefixList</tt> | <tt>ec2:Subnet</tt> |
--   <tt>ec2:TrafficMirrorTarget</tt> | <tt>ec2:TransitGateway</tt> |
--   <tt>imagebuilder:Component</tt> | <tt>imagebuilder:Image</tt> |
--   <tt>imagebuilder:ImageRecipe</tt> |
--   <tt>imagebuilder:ContainerRecipe</tt> | <tt>glue:Catalog</tt> |
--   <tt>glue:Database</tt> | <tt>glue:Table</tt> |
--   <tt>license-manager:LicenseConfiguration</tt> I
--   <tt>network-firewall:FirewallPolicy</tt> |
--   <tt>network-firewall:StatefulRuleGroup</tt> |
--   <tt>network-firewall:StatelessRuleGroup</tt> |
--   <tt>outposts:Outpost</tt> | <tt>resource-groups:Group</tt> |
--   <tt>rds:Cluster</tt> | <tt>route53resolver:FirewallRuleGroup</tt>
--   |<tt>route53resolver:ResolverQueryLogConfig</tt> |
--   <tt>route53resolver:ResolverRule</tt> | <tt>s3-outposts:Outpost</tt> |
--   <tt>ssm-contacts:Contact</tt> | <tt>ssm-incidents:ResponsePlan</tt>
[$sel:resourceType:ListResources'] :: ListResources -> Maybe Text

-- | The token for the next page of results.
[$sel:nextToken:ListResources'] :: ListResources -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
[$sel:resourceArns:ListResources'] :: ListResources -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The principal.
[$sel:principal:ListResources'] :: ListResources -> Maybe Text

-- | The maximum number of results to return with a single call. To
--   retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned
--   <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
[$sel:maxResults:ListResources'] :: ListResources -> Maybe Natural

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of the resource shares.
[$sel:resourceShareArns:ListResources'] :: ListResources -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The type of owner.
[$sel:resourceOwner:ListResources'] :: ListResources -> ResourceOwner

-- | Create a value of <a>ListResources</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

--   <tt>appmesh:Mesh</tt> | <tt>codebuild:Project</tt> |
--   <tt>codebuild:ReportGroup</tt> | <tt>ec2:CapacityReservation</tt> |
--   <tt>ec2:DedicatedHost</tt> | <tt>ec2:LocalGatewayRouteTable</tt> |
--   <tt>ec2:PrefixList</tt> | <tt>ec2:Subnet</tt> |

--   <tt>imagebuilder:Component</tt> | <tt>imagebuilder:Image</tt> |
--   <tt>imagebuilder:ImageRecipe</tt> |
--   <tt>imagebuilder:ContainerRecipe</tt> | <tt>glue:Catalog</tt> |
--   <tt>glue:Database</tt> | <tt>glue:Table</tt> |
--   <tt>license-manager:LicenseConfiguration</tt> I
--   <tt>network-firewall:FirewallPolicy</tt> |
--   <tt>network-firewall:StatefulRuleGroup</tt> |
--   <tt>network-firewall:StatelessRuleGroup</tt> |
--   <tt>outposts:Outpost</tt> | <tt>resource-groups:Group</tt> |
--   <tt>rds:Cluster</tt> | <tt>route53resolver:FirewallRuleGroup</tt>
--   |<tt>route53resolver:ResolverQueryLogConfig</tt> |
--   <tt>route53resolver:ResolverRule</tt> | <tt>s3-outposts:Outpost</tt> |
--   <tt>ssm-contacts:Contact</tt> | <tt>ssm-incidents:ResponsePlan</tt>

--   of the resources.

-- | The resource type.

-- | Lists the principals that you have shared resources with or that have
--   shared resources with you.
--   
--   This operation returns paginated results.
module Amazonka.RAM.ListPrincipals

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newListPrincipals</a> smart constructor.
data ListPrincipals
ListPrincipals' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe [Text] -> ResourceOwner -> ListPrincipals

-- | The resource type.
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>acm-pca:CertificateAuthority</tt> |
--   <tt>appmesh:Mesh</tt> | <tt>codebuild:Project</tt> |
--   <tt>codebuild:ReportGroup</tt> | <tt>ec2:CapacityReservation</tt> |
--   <tt>ec2:DedicatedHost</tt> | <tt>ec2:LocalGatewayRouteTable</tt> |
--   <tt>ec2:PrefixList</tt> | <tt>ec2:Subnet</tt> |
--   <tt>ec2:TrafficMirrorTarget</tt> | <tt>ec2:TransitGateway</tt> |
--   <tt>imagebuilder:Component</tt> | <tt>imagebuilder:Image</tt> |
--   <tt>imagebuilder:ImageRecipe</tt> |
--   <tt>imagebuilder:ContainerRecipe</tt> | <tt>glue:Catalog</tt> |
--   <tt>glue:Database</tt> | <tt>glue:Table</tt> |
--   <tt>license-manager:LicenseConfiguration</tt> I
--   <tt>network-firewall:FirewallPolicy</tt> |
--   <tt>network-firewall:StatefulRuleGroup</tt> |
--   <tt>network-firewall:StatelessRuleGroup</tt> |
--   <tt>outposts:Outpost</tt> | <tt>resource-groups:Group</tt> |
--   <tt>rds:Cluster</tt> | <tt>route53resolver:FirewallRuleGroup</tt>
--   |<tt>route53resolver:ResolverQueryLogConfig</tt> |
--   <tt>route53resolver:ResolverRule</tt> | <tt>s3-outposts:Outpost</tt> |
--   <tt>ssm-contacts:Contact</tt> | <tt>ssm-incidents:ResponsePlan</tt>
[$sel:resourceType:ListPrincipals'] :: ListPrincipals -> Maybe Text

-- | The principals.
[$sel:principals:ListPrincipals'] :: ListPrincipals -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The token for the next page of results.

--   retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned

--   example, to list only permissions that apply to EC2 subnets, specify
--   <tt>ec2:Subnet</tt>.

-- | Gets the resource shares that you own or the resource shares that are
--   shared with you.
--   
--   This operation returns paginated results.
module Amazonka.RAM.GetResourceShares

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newGetResourceShares</a> smart constructor.
data GetResourceShares
GetResourceShares' :: Maybe [TagFilter] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ResourceShareStatus -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe [Text] -> ResourceOwner -> GetResourceShares

-- | One or more tag filters.
[$sel:tagFilters:GetResourceShares'] :: GetResourceShares -> Maybe [TagFilter]

-- | The token for the next page of results.
[$sel:nextToken:GetResourceShares'] :: GetResourceShares -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the resource share.
[$sel:name:GetResourceShares'] :: GetResourceShares -> Maybe Text

-- | The status of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareStatus:GetResourceShares'] :: GetResourceShares -> Maybe ResourceShareStatus

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the RAM permission that is
--   associated with the resource share.
[$sel:permissionArn:GetResourceShares'] :: GetResourceShares -> Maybe Text

-- | The maximum number of results to return with a single call. To
--   retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned
--   <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
[$sel:maxResults:GetResourceShares'] :: GetResourceShares -> Maybe Natural

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resource shares.
[$sel:resourceShareArns:GetResourceShares'] :: GetResourceShares -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The type of owner.
[$sel:resourceOwner:GetResourceShares'] :: GetResourceShares -> ResourceOwner

-- | Create a value of <a>GetResourceShares</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:tagFilters:GetResourceShares'</a>,
--   <a>getResourceShares_tagFilters</a> - One or more tag filters.
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextToken:GetResourceShares'</a>,
--   <a>getResourceShares_nextToken</a> - The token for the next page of
--   results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:GetResourceShares'</a>, <a>getResourceShares_name</a> -
--   The name of the resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareStatus:GetResourceShares'</a>,
--   <a>getResourceShares_resourceShareStatus</a> - The status of the
--   resource share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:permissionArn:GetResourceShares'</a>,
--   <a>getResourceShares_permissionArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of the RAM permission that is associated with the resource
--   share.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maxResults:GetResourceShares'</a>,
--   <a>getResourceShares_maxResults</a> - The maximum number of results to
--   return with a single call. To retrieve the remaining results, make
--   another call with the returned <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceShareArns:GetResourceShares'</a>,
--   <a>getResourceShares_resourceShareArns</a> - The Amazon Resource Names
--   (ARNs) of the resource shares.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceOwner:GetResourceShares'</a>,
--   <a>getResourceShares_resourceOwner</a> - The type of owner.
newGetResourceShares :: ResourceOwner -> GetResourceShares

instance Amazonka.Data.Path.ToPath Amazonka.RAM.DeleteResourceShare.DeleteResourceShare
instance Amazonka.Data.Query.ToQuery Amazonka.RAM.DeleteResourceShare.DeleteResourceShare


-- | Creates a resource share. You must provide a list of the Amazon
--   Resource Names (ARNs) for the resources you want to share. You must
--   also specify who you want to share the resources with, and the
--   permissions that you grant them.
--   
--   Sharing a resource makes it available for use by principals outside of
--   the Amazon Web Services account that created the resource. Sharing
--   doesn't change any permissions or quotas that apply to the resource in
--   the account that created it.
module Amazonka.RAM.CreateResourceShare

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateResourceShare</a> smart constructor.
data CreateResourceShare
CreateResourceShare' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Bool -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [Tag] -> Text -> CreateResourceShare

-- | A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the
--   idempotency of the request.
[$sel:clientToken:CreateResourceShare'] :: CreateResourceShare -> Maybe Text

-- | Indicates whether principals outside your organization in
--   Organizations can be associated with a resource share.
[$sel:allowExternalPrincipals:CreateResourceShare'] :: CreateResourceShare -> Maybe Bool

-- | The principals to associate with the resource share. The possible
--   values are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>An Amazon Web Services account ID</li>
--   <li>An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an organization in
--   Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an organizational unit (OU) in Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM role</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM user</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   Not all resource types can be shared with IAM roles and IAM users. For
--   more information, see <a>Sharing with IAM roles and IAM users</a> in
--   the <i>Resource Access Manager User Guide</i>.
[$sel:principals:CreateResourceShare'] :: CreateResourceShare -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The ARNs of the resources to associate with the resource share.
[$sel:resourceArns:CreateResourceShare'] :: CreateResourceShare -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the permissions to associate with
--   the resource share. If you do not specify an ARN for the permission,
--   RAM automatically attaches the default version of the permission for
--   each resource type. Only one permission can be associated with each
--   resource type in a resource share.
[$sel:permissionArns:CreateResourceShare'] :: CreateResourceShare -> Maybe [Text]

-- | One or more tags.
[$sel:tags:CreateResourceShare'] :: CreateResourceShare -> Maybe [Tag]

-- | The name of the resource share.
[$sel:name:CreateResourceShare'] :: CreateResourceShare -> Text

--   omitted.

-- | Associates a permission with a resource share.
module Amazonka.RAM.AssociateResourceSharePermission

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newAssociateResourceSharePermission</a> smart
--   constructor.
data AssociateResourceSharePermission
AssociateResourceSharePermission' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Text -> Text -> AssociateResourceSharePermission

-- | Indicates whether the permission should replace the permissions that
--   are currently associated with the resource share. Use <tt>true</tt> to
--   replace the current permissions. Use <tt>false</tt> to add the
--   permission to the current permission.
[$sel:replace:AssociateResourceSharePermission'] :: AssociateResourceSharePermission -> Maybe Bool

-- | A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the
--   idempotency of the request.
[$sel:clientToken:AssociateResourceSharePermission'] :: AssociateResourceSharePermission -> Maybe Text

-- | The version of the RAM permissions to associate with the resource
--   share.
[$sel:permissionVersion:AssociateResourceSharePermission'] :: AssociateResourceSharePermission -> Maybe Int

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareArn:AssociateResourceSharePermission'] :: AssociateResourceSharePermission -> Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the RAM permission to associate with
--   the resource share.
[$sel:permissionArn:AssociateResourceSharePermission'] :: AssociateResourceSharePermission -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssociateResourceSharePermission</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   current permission.
--   
--   <a>$sel:clientToken:AssociateResourceSharePermission'</a>,

-- | Associates the specified resource share with the specified principals
--   and resources.
module Amazonka.RAM.AssociateResourceShare

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newAssociateResourceShare</a> smart constructor.
data AssociateResourceShare
AssociateResourceShare' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe [Text] -> Text -> AssociateResourceShare

-- | A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the
--   idempotency of the request.
[$sel:clientToken:AssociateResourceShare'] :: AssociateResourceShare -> Maybe Text

-- | The principals to associate with the resource share. The possible
--   values are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>An Amazon Web Services account ID</li>
--   <li>An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an organization in
--   Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an organizational unit (OU) in Organizations</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM role</li>
--   <li>An ARN of an IAM user</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   Not all resource types can be shared with IAM roles and IAM users. For
--   more information, see <a>Sharing with IAM roles and IAM users</a> in
--   the <i>Resource Access Manager User Guide</i>.
[$sel:principals:AssociateResourceShare'] :: AssociateResourceShare -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
[$sel:resourceArns:AssociateResourceShare'] :: AssociateResourceShare -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource share.
[$sel:resourceShareArn:AssociateResourceShare'] :: AssociateResourceShare -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>AssociateResourceShare</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--

--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--
